title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Meet the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set—the perfectly matched duo for every job, from tight spaces to everyday projects. Whether you’re a DIYer, homeowner, or pro, this set gives you precision, power, and comfort in one smart bundle.

What’s inside:
- 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer: Compact and maneuverable for tight spots, drawer assemblies, light fixtures, and delicate tasks.
- 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer: Your go-to for framing, repairs, and daily use with satisfying striking power.

Built for performance:
- High carbon steel heads, heat treated for higher hardness and durability, with a polished finish and rust-preventative clear coating for long-lasting reliability.
- Narrow, flat striking face for accurate hits; sharpened, curved claws deliver maximum leverage for effortless nail pulling.
- Well-balanced design for better control and less fatigue during prolonged use.

Comfort and control:
- Ergonomic, soft, non-slip rubber handles with TPR coating provide a secure grip, even with sweaty or gloved hands.
- Fiberglass handle construction absorbs vibration and reduces hand strain for smoother swings and cleaner strikes.

Thoughtful details:
- Glue-feed technology enhances head-to-handle bonding for robust, long-term performance.
- Easy handling and convenient operation for users of all skill levels.
- Built-in hang holes for neat storage and quick access.

From hanging pictures to heavy-duty repairs, the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set is the dependable, do-it-all pair you’ll reach for first. Get the right size, the right balance, and the right results—every time.
